summary: Project to include an automatically generated sales history feature shown within the existing dashboard, with ability to retrieve all sales records.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend sales recording flow to collect buyer information and submit it when recording a sale.

Implement the Sales History UI by replacing the placeholder with a working list view (using getAllSales) and a details view (using getSale) showing date, total amount, buyer info, line items, and notes.
Show sales history within the existing Dashboard section by adding a "Recent Sales" area that lists the most recent sales and links to the full Sales History page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Sales history feature: automatically record sales with fields items sold, amount, buyer info, and date; display within existing dashboard section
Add 'Get all sales' capability to retrieve all sales records (e.g., for dashboard listing/reporting)

Extend the backend Sale data to include buyer information and ensure sales are recorded automatically when the existing recordSale function is called, storing: items sold (lineItems), total amount, buyer info, and date/time.
Add backend query endpoints to retrieve sales history, including an endpoint to get all sales records ("getAllSales") and an endpoint to retrieve a single sale by id ("getSale").

projectName: Implement backend sales history retrieval and show sales history on dashboard
